summary.para: Gets a pointer to a Media Foundation transform (MFT) for a specified stream.

param.name: dwStreamIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of a stream.

param.name: dwTransformIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the MFT to retrieve.

param.name: pGuidCategory
param.para: Receives a pointer to a GUID that specifies the category of the MFT. For a list of possible values, see MFT_CATEGORY.

param.name: ppTransform
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface of the MFT. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The Sink Writer implements this interface in Windows 8. To get a pointer to this interface, call on the Sink Writer.
